notes.title: Supporting Information Available
notes.p:
The Supporting Information is available free of charge on the ACS Publications website at DOI: 10.1021/acsomega.9b01176.
Energy vs c/ a ratio curves, partial DOS for x = 0.50 with the GGA + U method, total DOS for x = 0.33, 0.50, and 0.67 with the GGA + U method, the Brillouin zone path used for band calculations, electronic band structure for x = 0.50 with the GGA + U method, electronic band structure for x = 1 with the GGA + U method, variation of energy difference between magnetic and nonmagnetic states with x, and sum rule analysis ( PDF)
